oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Ruby Jamison Oral History Interview, 2011 October 14
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Ruby Jamison, conducted on October 14 2011 by Andrea Blackman as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Jamison describes the flooding of her home, her friend Joan’s home, their escape, and the aftermath of the flood.
The complete interview and transcript are available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jamison, Ruby--Interviews
